attributes.action: STOP Slough Bankrupt Labour Run Council raising Council Tax to Pay 4 Bankruptcy
attributes.additional_details: Do not leave the asset stripping or control of this Council or Town to remain under this failing Leadership .
attributes.background:
Do not allow Slough Council to financially Punish Innocent Residents in this Town .
We are the Tax Payers & We want a voice .
Make them SBC Sell SBC HQ instead , 25 Windsor Road worth £47 Million & £8.5 Million Refurbishment that they refuse to do .
It’s our money ( Tax Payers Money ) Our Money .

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about local council tax rates are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to specific organisations outside of the UK Government or Parliament, including individual local authorities.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
